value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices learning path
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Azure DevOps enables transparency and cooperation with continuous delivery and deployment for your development lifecycle.

topItems.title: Assess your existing software development process
topItems.excerpt: Use a value stream map to help you examine your existing processes and technologies.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore what DevOps is (and isn't) and learn how to get started with Azure DevOps.

topItems.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
topItems.excerpt: Learn to foster the DevOps values of transparency and team cooperation with Azure Boards.

images.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development

topItems.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to your end users. Azure DevOps is a set of services that gives you the tools you need to do just that. With Azure DevOps, you can build, test, and deploy any application, either to the cloud or on premises. DevOps practices that enable transparency, cooperation, continuous delivery and continuous deployment become embedded in your software development lifecycle.

topItems.title: Assess your existing software development process
topItems.excerpt: Use a value stream map to help you examine your existing processes and technologies.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore what DevOps is (and isn't) and learn how to get started with Azure DevOps.

topItems.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
topItems.excerpt: Learn to foster the DevOps values of transparency and team cooperation with Azure Boards.

images.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development

topItems.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

value.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Azure Functions allow developers to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning infrastructure.

images.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Secure internal resources, external resources, SaaS applications, and more by using Azure Active Directory. Learn about the features and capabilities of Azure AD.

images.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory

value.title: AZ-400: Define and implement continuous integration
value.excerpt:
Create automated pipelines that continuously build, test, package, and deploy your applications.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

images.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up automated testing in your pipeline to improve code quality.

images.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
topItems.excerpt: Manage your application and the packages it uses across build pipelines.

images.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts

topItems.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use your own build agent when Microsoft-hosted agents don't meet your needs.

images.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

value.title: Build applications with Azure DevOps learning path
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to collaborate with others to continuously build, test, and verify your applications using Azure Pipelines and GitHub.

topItems.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

images.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Collaborate with others and merge only the highest quality code.

images.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub

topItems.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up automated testing in your pipeline to improve code quality.

images.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

images.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: You want to build great things on Azure, but you’re not sure exactly what that means. Using key principles throughout your architecture regardless of technology choice, can help you design, build, and continuously improve your architecture.

images.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT
value.excerpt: Interested in building end to end IoT solutions or about Azure IoT, but aren't quite sure what it can do for you? This path is the place to start.

topItems.title: Enabling digital transformation
topItems.excerpt: Digital transformation is a business innovation fueled by the explosion of the cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT).  and allows organizations with new ways to understand and transform their business.

images.title: Enabling digital transformation

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
topItems.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

images.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
topItems.excerpt: Assess the characteristics of Azure IoT Hub and determine scenarios when to use IoT Hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub

topItems.title: Learn how to manage IoT devices as an IT admin
topItems.excerpt: This module is an introduction to the Internet of Things for IT admins.

images.title: Learn how to manage IoT devices as an IT admin
Enabling digital transformation

value.title: Manage security operations in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure security policies and manage security alerts with the tools and services in Azure.

topItems.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

images.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

topItems.title: Create security baselines
topItems.excerpt: Create security baselines

images.title: Create security baselines

topItems.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you’ll discover how to detect and respond to threats with Azure Security Center.

images.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

images.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

value.title: Protect identity and access with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: The **Identity and Access learning path** covers the latest identity and access technologies, tools for strengthening authentication, and guidance on identity protection within your organization. Microsoft access and identity technologies enable you to secure your organization’s identity, whether it is on-premises or in the cloud, and empower your users to work securely from any location.

topItems.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how identity and access management work in Microsoft 365.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

topItems.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Microsoft 365 authentication tools for access and identity provisioning.

images.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Microsoft 365

topItems.title: Strengthen authentication with Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to strengthen authentication across your enterprise deployment with security tools from Microsoft 365.

images.title: Strengthen authentication with Microsoft 365

topItems.title: Secure administrator accounts in Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

value.title: Protect identity and access with Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Identity & access management is the foundation for a secure digital estate. The credentials that you issue to your users prove that they are who they claim to be and that they have permission to access your resources. Learn how to use Microsoft 365 to for authentication and authorization in your enterprise environment.

topItems.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how identity and access management work in Microsoft 365.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

topItems.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Microsoft 365 authentication tools for access and identity provisioning.

images.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Microsoft 365

topItems.title: Strengthen authentication with Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to strengthen authentication across your enterprise deployment with security tools from Microsoft 365.

images.title: Strengthen authentication with Microsoft 365

topItems.title: Secure administrator accounts in Microsoft 365
topItems.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB learning path
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to customize NoSQL data storage and distribution with the Azure portal, Cosmos DB extension, and Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

topItems.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
topItems.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

topItems.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

topItems.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
topItems.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: NoSQL data is an efficient way to store information that doesn’t map to the requirements of a relational SQL database. Learn how to use the Azure portal, the Azure Cosmos DB extension for Visual Studio Code, and the Azure Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK to work with your NoSQL data where you want, and provide your users with high availability, no matter where they are in the world.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

topItems.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

topItems.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

topItems.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
topItems.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Install Azure PowerShell locally and use it to manage Azure resources.

images.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell

value.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and code to connect it to Azure Storage.

images.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

images.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

images.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
Design your migration to Azure

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: AZ-400: Manage source control
value.excerpt:
Learn how GitHub enables you to build a modern source control strategy that fosters collaboration and enables you to automate your build and deployment processes.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

images.title: Introduction to GitHub

topItems.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn to move your existing project to GitHub from a legacy version control system.

images.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices

topItems.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

images.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices

topItems.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage changes to your repository source by using pull requests.

images.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
Introduction to GitHub

value.title: Build JavaScript applications with Node.js
value.excerpt: Node.js provides a large set of built-in APIs that help you build various types of applications, command-line apps, web apps, and more. It also offers testing and debugging capabilities and a rich ecosystem of third-party packages that you can easily add to your application.

topItems.title: Introduction to Node.js
topItems.excerpt: Learn everything about Node.js: what it is, how does it work and when to use it.

topItems.title: Create a new Node.js project and work with dependencies
topItems.excerpt: Create a Node.js project and learn to add packages and manage package dependencies in your project.

topItems.title: Interactively debug Node.js apps with the built-in and Visual Studio Code debuggers
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to efficiently debug your Node.js app using Visual Studio Code to fix your bugs quickly.

topItems.title: Work with files and directories in a Node.js app
topItems.excerpt: Build an app that manipulates files and directories with Node.js.

value.title: SAP certified offerings for Azure
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to understand how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will provide the basis for running SAP workloads in Azure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads
topItems.excerpt: With the recently expanded partnership between Microsoft and SAP, you can run SAP applications across development, test, and production scenarios in Azure, taking advantage of the scalability, flexibility, and cost savings of Microsoft Azure.

images.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads

topItems.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP for deploying SAP solutions in Azure. In addition, you will look at the options for deploying SAP in Azure.

images.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure

topItems.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
topItems.excerpt: There are many SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs. In this module, you will review the SAP recommended support products for VM types and the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

images.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads

topItems.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
topItems.excerpt: SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non-shared host/server bare-metal hardware.

images.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads

value.title: Create an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Storage account with the correct options for your business needs.

images.title: Create an Azure Storage account

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing to your application, so you improve your ability to distribute your application around the world. Use Traffic Manager to improve the performance and availability of your application.

images.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager

value.title: Explore core data concepts
value.excerpt: Discover how you can organize and process data, explore relational and non-relational databases, and discover how you can process data in batches or using streams.

images.title: Explore core data concepts

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

images.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints

value.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use RBAC to manage access to resources in Azure.

images.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)

value.title: Use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Training a machine learning model is an iterative process that requires time and compute resources. Automated machine learning can help make it easier.

value.title: AI business school for education
value.excerpt: Decision-makers in education have considerations that are particular to their sector to help them realize the true transformational impact of AI in education. It is critical to understand the components of a strategy that will help the education sector create value with AI. This learning path is designed for education decision-makers to illustrate the true transformational impact of AI in education.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI – and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
topItems.excerpt: In education, decision-makers must take into account specific industry considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI. Educational institutions and organizations need to think strategically about AI—and they need to start today. To create real value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: A successful AI strategy must consider cultural issues as well as business issues. Becoming an AI-ready organization requires a fundamental transformation in how you do things, how employees relate to each other, what skills they have, and what processes and principles guide your behaviors. This unit is designed to help you understand which are the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and proposes a framework to drive that change in your organization.

images.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: This module is designed for finance and affiliated business decision-makers to illustrate the impact of making strategic decisions with AI. The goal is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
Define an AI strategy to create business value
